MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Botwnnog, Sarn, and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10:05 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further line patrols are needed to locate the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  12:15 pm on 22nd January, 2021.
